mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, category, map_json, user_id, party_id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{category},#{mapJson}, #{userId}, #{partyId})
mapper.update: update article set delete_yn = 'Y' where article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select a.*, u.*, count(l.likes_id) as likesCount from article a left join article_likes l on a.article_id = l.target_id join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: update article set view_count = view_count +1 where article_id = #{articleId}
